messages.subject: Re: Another parenting question  (was Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]   TheChristian Atheletic Association
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/15/03 7:46:17 AM, shyrley.williams@verizon.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/15/03 7:46:17 AM, shyrley.williams@... writes:

<< The KKK still going? I thought that was a 30's thing? >>

That's when their uniforms were more in style. I think they've moved north,
too, to Michigan and thereabout.

(I'm partly joking, and partly not.)

So add that to your list of advice for Brits visiting the U.S.

Don't smoke dope at a Skinhead rally; probably just don't go. Especially if
you're Black, Jewish, Arab, female, long-haired male... Probably just
don't go.

Sandra
